locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ aka just warm enough to keep the pipes from freezing. Management must be cheap. There was also a bit of poop on the toilet in the shower I used. Seems like they have a high turn over rate here. When I got in the shower room the fan was on ‚Ä¶
Shower floor had toilet paper on it. Still some in the toilet and you could see the toilet wasn‚Äôt cleaned well. The shower stall had hair in the drain.

This is by far the nastiest shower I experienced thank God I bring my own Cleaning Supply to sanitize before I shower the person in charge of cleaning the bathroom tonight might as well just quit it for another job how could you not clean ‚Ä¶

My boyfriend and I do mobile auto repair. We came in to use the facilities and didn't really think it thru until he fell in the shower. But I've never heard of public bathrooms not having rubber mats too prevent falling. Upon telling the ‚Ä¶
Don‚Äôt even wanna give one star. Shower was slimy and filthy barley any hot water or water pressure. Toilet was filthy!

Although the Dennys is closed the Pepperoni pizza was perfect, normally it isn‚Äôt at other stops but they got the secret recipe at this one. Restrooms and shower rooms are clean. Cashiers are friendly. I heard one of the cleaning staff ‚Ä¶
Took a shower and let's just say I wasn't happy to see someone else old dinner and dirty rag in the shower assigned to me workers are not cleaning up properly üòíü•¥ü§∑üèø‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è ‚Ä¶

Terrance & Taylor thank you so much for maintaining and keeping showers clean! It‚Äôs hard on the road being away from home and to find a comfortable and clean place to shower was very impressing. Thank you for taking pride in your work!!! Th ‚Ä¶

This travel center has a variety of services including washing machine and shower stations. We stopped for food and even though this service area was under staff, the cashier who was also serving the food and refilling the hotdog and hot ‚Ä¶

Just keep rolling fellas not worth a stop..Horrible experience. Was told i couldn't pay for a shower. Only reservations on app. Im out of points and shower power. Tried to ask and was denied. App wouldn't let me pay either. Thats the last ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Regional trucker (home weekly), and this TA is a great place to take a break. Nice clean, convenient shower facilities, and all the little nicknacks you usually need to grab during your downtime. The staff is friendly and courteous as well.
Nice Big Quiet But Only A Few Good Maintenance Personnel. So Shower's Can Be Slow/Backed Up Certain Times. They Have Security

If you are a professional driver and you are looking for a hot shower after a long day don't expect one at this TA, just like 90% of their facilities low water pressure and lukewarm water with fluctuations in temperature.

I took a shower at this location and I had a good experience and was pretty clean white guy with white shirt keeps floor and showers/restrooms pretty clean and does an awesome job also his willing to help you if you don‚Äôt know how to type ‚Ä¶

So me and my husband come in to shower before we head out well my husband accidentally left his wallet in the shower room well we noticed it missing after we left I called and they said they have it we go back to get it just to find out ‚Ä¶

Good Shower, water pressure reminded me of Rambo in the Jail clean up scene.
" Will said Clean him up, so clean him up, don't forget to get him behind the ears...ha ha ha ha ha..."
Family Friendly People
oxox

All is great from the service tech Andrew to Elise the waitress and the counter and shower girls. Andrew took care of my truck issue's in a timely manner and listened to my concerns. He did a job well done. Elise was very friendly and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ clean and free of the plastic yellow land mines. Restrooms were clean and didn't have that dirty driver smell like so many do. Shower # 5 was clean with plenty of hot water that never ran out. Shower #7 was clean too with the same quality ‚Ä¶

Good place.. I have running dedicated around this area for a month and never a wait for shower. Clean and restaurant is always ready to serve. Drop trailers can be irritating to some but the area dictates how the stop is used.  No ‚Ä¶

Mostly ok... Only complaint I have is for the high price of a shower I'd think I could have had clean towels to dry off with. Mine was full of someone's hair knotted in it. Bathroom was mostly clean but could improve.

Best of the best people are very kind and friendly plenty of parking for semi trucks
Bathroom and shower very well maintained love it love it love it
The shower doesn't work, I joined the queue in the app, but the queue doesn't move. There is no one in the bathrooms. Give me back my money!

showerReviews.reviewText: The Staff was Amazing. $20 to park and there was plenty of parking spaces available . There is only 1 Shower and it is $20. The Shower is NASTY bottom line. This shower was worse than a shower I took  in Iraq or Afghanistan. There is no ‚Ä¶
I was able to park.  Take a shower, and grab some snacks. Thanking the owners.

‚Ä¶ gem on my way to the port of DE. its an older station but very functional. prices were good and customer service was awesome. Kumar was very helpful and had a great attitude. shower was clean. as i say its a bit older but clean and tidy

‚Ä¶ polite .Just what I needed on a Friday night in this traffic. Kumar who is on duty. Talked me into a 100 gallons of fuel for a shower and free parking. But at 2.79 a gallon with no tax. And parking at only 12.00 for 24 hours. The place ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ‚Äò this place is my favorite truck stop for fuel snacks and other types of accessiories‚Äô this is Delaware number one truck stop ‚Äò this truck stop also have clean shower ‚Äò and lots of truck space for parking ‚Äò GREAT PLACE I LOVE IT HERE ‚Äò

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ showers 45% out of 100% ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ stopping in this Plaza just under 1 yr now. I intentionally avoid buying fuel here or spending any money in the store because of my disappointments. .... 1 st problem no showers. Then they installed showers and no matter how much fuel ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I am living so close :) Wish to have place like that somewhere further.  Tasty food,  interesting stock,  prices of course not a Wallmart but affordable . Year after year they going better and better.  One minus is shower policy
Quick stop for a shower üöø... Cheaper than the major truck stops... Got the job done ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Spent the night and decided to get a shower. $13 well spent. Modern, roomy and clean. Had.the same tile in the shower stall l have at home. I loved the dual shower heads with the rainfall shower head above you! Felt like home. No soap ‚Ä¶

I purchased 117 gallons of fuel and wanted a shower, but was told I had to pay $13.00 because they are an independent truck stop. I don't fuel anywhere but independent truck stops, and with few exceptions they give you a free shower. I know ‚Ä¶

I've been coming here for years. I'm sure glad to have a shower. Just wish it was not cold. The restaurant is now under staffed. Poor service and undercooked food. Because of management. Again under staffed! Not  poor staff.

This is my 19th year driving and this was the absolute worst shower experience I've ever had, literally. The shower room like walking in to a sauna at around 105 degrees, no towels, no soap, and I still had to pay 10 dollars after ‚Ä¶
It has good food, good quality and good price fuel but they should give free shower after 75 gallons instead 150. People there are very nice.
Showers are big and clean but there's no a/c inside showers and the fan doesn't help with the hot inside, I can't even imagine if I take a shower with hot water, I'll pass out...
